front.title: IEEE Standard for Extensions to Standard Test Interface Language (STIL) (IEEE Std 1450-1999) for Semiconductor Design Environments

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Replaced by IEC 62526 Ed. 1 (2007-11. Standard Test Interface Language (STIL) provides an interface between digital test generation tools and test equipment. Extensions to the test interface language (contained in this standard) are defined that (1) facilitate the use of the language in the design environment and (2) facilitate the use of the language for large designs encompassing subdesigns with reusable patterns.
